description: Creates a custom action target in Security Hub. You can use custom actions on findings and insights in Security Hub to trigger target actions in Amazon CloudWatch Events.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the custom action target. Can contain up to 20 characters.

parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: The description for the custom action target.

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: The ID for the custom action target. Can contain up to 20 alphanumeric characters.

nested_items.name: ActionTargetArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the custom action target.
